events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund for my recent order.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah L. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order, and I’m here to help resolve it as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 78451239 and attached is a photo showing the product I got, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect product or dispose of it as you wish.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. This solution works perfectly for me, thank you!
The refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your account within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
As we have received no further issues, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Please take a moment to complete this satisfaction survey about your recent support experience.
